mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT(category_id, name, price, stock, content, supplier, storage) VALUES(#{category_id}, #{name}, #{price}, #{stock}, #{content}, #{supplier}, #{storage})
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET CATEGORY_ID = #{category_id}, NAME = #{name}, PRICE = #{price}, STOCK = #{stock}, CONTENT = #{content}, SUPPLIER = #{supplier}, STORAGE = #{storage} WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{product_id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PRODUCT WHERE NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%');
